channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Cursed [Neutral Offensive]
channel.description:
The Cursed [Neutral Offensive] [Unique] Immune to conversion. Objective: Curse all living players.
**Passive:** Never Die Your curse gives you night death immunity.
**Passive:** Dread Every three nights (so 3, 6, 9 etc) your curse will become unbearable, occupying you. Dread occupation can't be seen by the Observer.
**Day Ability:** Transfer Curse [2 uses] Transfer a curse you've placed on a dead player to a living player.
**Night Ability 1:** Curse [Infinite Uses] The targeted player will be cursed (a status, not the class), occupying them on **Dread** nights. They will not be notified that they have been cursed at any point. Occupy immune classes will not be occupied, only being notified that someone tried to occupy them on **Dread** nights, but still count as cursed for the purposes of your objective.
**Night Ability 2:** Dread Transfer [2 uses, can only be used on Dread nights] Occupy a target player by transferring your dread to them.
